main event: On November 6, 1957, multiple witnesses reported seeing unidentified flying objects in various locations, particularly in Albuquerque, New Mexico.
interesting points: A meteorologist observed a bright yellowish-white light moving unusually in the sky., Witnesses included two police officers who saw a light hovering at high speed., Another witness, a civilian, described the object as round and emitting a reddish glow., Multiple cases from different areas were reported around the same time on November 6, suggesting a larger phenomenon., Some witnesses reported that the objects interfered with radio and television signals in the area.
sighted object: Bright light, round and disc-shaped objects
